com.robopupu.api.plugin

Class AbstractPluginStateComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.dependency.ScopedObject
      • com.robopupu.api.plugin.AbstractPluginComponent
        • com.robopupu.api.plugin.AbstractPluginStateComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scopeable, PluginComponent, PluginStateComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractFeature, AbstractInteractor, AbstractPresenter

    public class AbstractPluginStateComponent
extends AbstractPluginComponent
implements PluginStateComponent
    AbstractPluginStateComponent provides an abstract base class for implementing PluginStateComponents.
